creditline: Presented by Mr. & Mrs. Arthur Wiesenberger in recognition of the outstanding achievements in the field of finance by Mr. Grady Clark, President of Investors Diversified Services, Inc., of Minneapolis, Minnesota.
description:
Madonna and Child relief, terra cotta, polychromed and gilded wood frame, Ital. XVIc cat. card dims H 31 x W 27\'; stored on rack

Three-quarter seated figure in scarlet robes and blue-hooded cloak, holding the Infant, Her right hand holding His.  She is seated, a missal in Her lap, at lower left the half-length figure of the Infant St. John, gazing upward in adoration; two winged cherub heads in the upper corners.  The whole surmounting a predella with winged cherub head.  Polychromed and gilded.  Wood tabernacle frame.
medium: Terracotta, polychromed and gilded wood frame
title: Madonna and Child relief
